achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_PUNCH_HUNTER
achievements.description: Punch a Hunter as he is pouncing.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_RESCUE_FROM_SMOKER
achievements.description: Rescue a Survivor from a Smoker's tongue before he takes damage.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_ONE_SHOT_KILL_WITCH
achievements.description: Kill a Witch with a single headshot.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_NO_TEAM_FINALE_DAMAGE
achievements.description: No Survivors take damage after contacting the rescue vehicle.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_NO_DAMAGE_AFTER_VOMIT
achievements.description: You or another Survivor take no damage after being vomited on by a Boomer.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_PROTECT_SURVIVORS_X_TIMES
achievements.description: Protect any Survivor from an attacking Infected 50 times.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_WITH_PISTOLS
achievements.description: Survive an entire campaign using only pistols.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_HEAL_X_SURVIVORS
achievements.description: Heal 25 Survivors with a first aid kit.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_GIVE_PILLS_X_SURVIVORS
achievements.description: Give pain pills to 10 Survivors.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_REVIVE_X_SURVIVORS
achievements.description: Revive 50 incapacitated Survivors.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_RESCUE_FROM_CLOSET
achievements.description: Rescue a Survivor trapped in a closet.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_RESCUE_FROM_HUNTER
achievements.description: Shove a Hunter off of a pinned and helpless Survivor.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_RESCUE_SELF_FROM_SMOKER
achievements.description: Kill a Smoker who has grabbed you with his tongue.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_RESCUE_X_FROM_SMOKER
achievements.description: Kill 10 Smokers as they are pulling helpless Survivors.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_BURN_X_INFECTED
achievements.description: Set 101 Infected on fire.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_DONT_AWAKEN_WITCH
achievements.description: Sneak past all Witches in a campaign without disturbing one.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_TANK_SOLO
achievements.description: Single-handedly kill a Tank.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_TANK_NO_DAMAGE
achievements.description: Kill a Tank without it dealing any damage to a Survivor.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_NO_FRIENDLY_FIRE
achievements.description: Play an entire campaign with no Survivors taking friendly fire damage.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_ALL_SURVIVORS_ALIVE
achievements.description: Beat a campaign with all 4 Survivors.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_NO_SELF_MEDKIT
achievements.description: Finish a campaign without ever using a first aid kit on yourself.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_WITCH_NO_DAMAGE
achievements.description: Kill a Witch without any Survivor taking damage from her.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_X_WITH_TURRET
achievements.description: Kill 1000 Infected with a mounted machine gun.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_BLOW_UP_X_INFECTED
achievements.description: Blow up 20 Infected in a single explosion.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_53595_INFECTED
achievements.description: Kill 53,595 Infected.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_HEALTH_MARTYR
achievements.description: Heal a fellow Survivor when your own health is below 10.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_COVER_FRIEND_INCAPPED
achievements.description: Save another Survivor from a Special Infected while on the ground.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SHOVE_AND_KILL_BOOMER
achievements.description: Shove a Boomer and then kill him without him splashing on anyone.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_WITHOUT_INCAP
achievements.description: Survive a campaign without being incapacitated.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_LEAVE_SAFEROOM_AND_REVIVE
achievements.description: Leave a safe room to save an incapped teammate and bring them back safely.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_ANY_IMPOSSIBLE
achievements.description: Survive any campaign on Expert.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_ALL_IMPOSSIBLE
achievements.displayName: WHAT ARE YOU TRYING TO PROVE?
achievements.description: Survive all campaigns on Expert.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_NO_SPECIAL_DAMAGE
achievements.description: Survive a campaign with no Survivors taking damage from Special Infected.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_BURN_WITCH
achievements.description: Light a Witch with a Molotov.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_BURN_TANK
achievements.description: Light a Tank with a Molotov.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_INFECTED_SNEAK_MELEE
achievements.description: Kill an Infected with a single blow from behind.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_NO_VOMIT
achievements.description: All Survivors complete a campaign without being vomited on.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_MAKE_X_HEADSHOTS
achievements.description: Make 100 headshot kills.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_HEADSHOT_HUNTER
achievements.description: Headshot a Hunter while he's leaping.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_HOSPITAL
achievements.description: Survive the No Mercy campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_SMALLTOWN
achievements.description: Survive the Death Toll campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_AIRPORT
achievements.description: Survive the Dead Air campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_FARM
achievements.description: Survive the Blood Harvest campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_COVER_ALL_WITH_BILE
achievements.description: Cover four Survivors with Boomer bile at once.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_DRAG_SURVIVOR_X_DISTANCE
achievements.description: Drag a Survivor 100 feet with your tongue as a Smoker.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_CONSTRICT_X_WITHOUT_DYING
achievements.description: Constrict two Survivors on one life as a Smoker.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_POUNCE_X_WITHOUT_DYING
achievements.description: Pounce two different Survivors on one life as a Hunter.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_ALL_WITHOUT_DYING
achievements.description: Kill all four Survivors on one life as a Tank.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_DOLE_X_TOTAL_DAMAGE
achievements.description: Dole out 5000 total Survivor damage as a Special Infected.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_INCAP_AFTER_SAFEROOM
achievements.description: As an Infected, incap a Survivor who has entered and left a safe room.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_INFECTED
achievements.description: Catch a rare strain of infection, then pass it on to someone else.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_PLAY_LIGHTHOUSE
achievements.description: Complete one round of Survival on The Last Stand.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_GET_ONE_BRONZE
achievements.description: Earn a Bronze medal in Survival mode on any official level.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_GET_ONE_SILVER
achievements.description: Earn a Silver medal in Survival mode on any official level.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_GET_ONE_GOLD
achievements.description: Earn a Gold medal in Survival mode on any official level.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_GET_ALL_BRONZE
achievements.description: Earn at least a Bronze medal on every official Survival level.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_GET_ALL_SILVER
achievements.description: Earn at least a Silver medal on every official Survival level.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_GET_ALL_GOLD
achievements.description: Earn a Gold medal on every official Survival level.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SURVIVE_GARAGE
achievements.description: Survive the Crash Course Campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_REPOWER_GENERATOR
achievements.description: Restart the generator within 30 seconds of it shutting off.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_5359_INFECTED_GARAGE
achievements.description: Kill 5,359 Infected in the Crash Course campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_VERSUS_GARAGE
achievements.description: Win a Versus campaign of Crash Course.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_WIPE_ALL_AFTER_TRUCK
achievements.description: Your team wipes all Survivors after the escape vehicle has opened in Crash Course.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_HIT_X_WITH_CAR
achievements.description: As A Tank hit 20 Survivors with a car in the Crash Course campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_CAUSE_X_POUNCE_DAMAGE
achievements.description: Pounce a Survivor for 25 points of damage in the Crash Course campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_DRAG_BILED_SURVIVOR
achievements.description: Smoker pull a bile-covered Survivor until you hold him during Crash Course.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_TANK_EXPLOSION_STUN
achievements.description: Stun a Tank with an explosion in the Crash Course campaign.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_INCAP_3_IN_5_SEC
achievements.description: Your team incapacitates three Survivors within five seconds.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_THE_SACRIFICE
achievements.description: Complete "The Sacrifice".

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_SACRIFICE_BILL
achievements.description: Have Bill sacrifice himself for the team.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_SPECIAL_WITH_BARREL
achievements.description: Kill a Special Infected with an exploding barrel.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_RUN_ALL_GENERATORS
achievements.description: Have all 3 generators running at once in "The Sacrifice" finale.

achievements.name: L4D_ACHIEVEMENT_VS_PREVENT_SACRIFICE
achievements.description: As a Special Infected, incap someone who is trying to sacrifice themselves.
